Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for all completed features.

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total budget spent on the project.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed by the team per sprint.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort for all tasks in a sprint.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of the sprint goals.

Name: minimize_number_of_blockers
Description: Minimize the total count of active blockers.

Name: maximize_user_story_completion
Description: Maximize the number of user stories with status 'done'.

Name: minimize_project_end_date
Description: Bring forward the project's end date as much as possible.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Prioritize work relevant to stakeholders with the highest influence.

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of all workers.

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the time for each sprint cycle.

Name: maximize_high_priority_epics
Description: Maximize the number of completed epics with high priority.
